channel.title: Open other script from a script?
channel.description: Hello, i need help, is it possible to open a script from an other script? Example "open(c:/programfiles/scar2.03/scripts/Tutorial.scar);" Is it? Please help, if someone help, they will get the script for auto-making account and login and do tutorial island, for FREE. With updates..! =)

item.title: Open other script from a script?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Theres no need for two seperate scripts. Just do this:

[scar]
procedure MakeAccount;
begin
//This procedure creates the account
end;

procedure TutorialIslandAuto;
begin
//This completes tutorial island
end;

begin
MakeAccount; //See, one procedure is right after the other
TutorialIslandAuto; //Yeah^^
end.
[/scar]

So the procedure “MakeAccount” holds your info on how to create the account, and “TutorialIslandAuto” is what does tutorial island.

Read full topic
item.source: Open other script from a script?
